pr_title: [Trace] Add trace for create tablet tasks

timeline.message:
[Trace] Add trace for create tablet tasks

Add trace for create tablet tasks, it's a useful tool for admin to find
out the bottleneck when create tablets timeouted.
For example, admin could enlarge 'tablet_map_shard_size' when found
'got tablets shard lock' procedure cost too much time.

timeline.bodyText: Could you please update hte be_config.md document?
timeline.author: morningman

replies.bodyText: Oh, this PR has been merged before I update docs, I'll do it in next PR.
replies.author: acelyc111
